messages.content: [Product Release Video] Generate 60s storyboard with the file I uploard

[
  {
    "screen_number": 1,
    "voiceover_text": "Introducing ClearVu-IQ: The intelligent linen management system for healthcare.",
    "target_duration_sec": 5,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "ClearVu-IQ logo animation, brand colors (#39D9A7, #9CD327, #424A58), Montserrat font, clean background",
    "action_notes": "Logo animates in center frame, subtle motion graphics"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 2,
    "voiceover_text": "Manual linen tracking causes shortages, inefficiencies, and rising costs.",
    "target_duration_sec": 8,
    "screen_type": "stock video",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Hospital scenes, staff handling linen, paper checklists, frustrated expressions, overlays of manual tracking",
    "action_notes": "Slow zoom on staff sorting linens, overlay icons for 'shortage', 'inefficiency', 'cost'"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 3,
    "voiceover_text": "ClearVu-IQ automates inventory tracking, with real-time data and instant low-stock alerts.",
    "target_duration_sec": 8,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Digital dashboard UI, animated alerts, inventory graphs, notification pop-ups",
    "action_notes": "Cursor highlights dashboard features, alert animation pops up"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 4,
    "voiceover_text": "AI-powered dashboards predict needs, optimize stock, and prevent shortages.",
    "target_duration_sec": 8,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Animated fill rate dashboard, utilization graphs, AI forecast animation, predictive analytics icons",
    "action_notes": "Graphs animate upward, AI icon pulses, stock levels adjust in real time"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 5,
    "voiceover_text": "Track every delivery and receipt with precision—no more guesswork.",
    "target_duration_sec": 8,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Staff scanning deliveries, OCR validation pop-up, seamless process flow, delivery logs updating",
    "action_notes": "Hand holds scanner over barcode, UI confirms delivery, smooth transitions"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 6,
    "voiceover_text": "Monitor KPIs, reduce waste, and save costs—empowering your team to focus on care.",
    "target_duration_sec": 8,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "KPI dashboard, happy staff, cost savings graphics, charts with downward waste trend",
    "action_notes": "Charts animate, staff smile, dollar sign icons appear"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 7,
    "voiceover_text": "Transform your linen logistics. Scan to schedule a demo or visit us online.",
    "target_duration_sec": 5,
    "screen_type": "cta",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "ClearVu-IQ logo, QR code, website URL, brand colors, call-to-action button",
    "action_notes": "QR code pulses, website URL animates in, strong CTA visual"
  }
]
